item.title: Piece Of Paper
item.caption: This note reads: 'A lethal poison is spreading through your body. You'll die at 15:00. The antidote is here but it's unreachable.' Signed: A. B.

item.title: Slowmo pills
item.caption: I ate the pills and the effect was immediate. I move really fast. I recall having more in the trunk of my car.

item.title: Window
item.caption: This window is always closed and I don't remember opening it up.

item.title: Wardrobe
item.caption: My wardrobe...I think.

item.title: Gun
item.caption: I took the gun, it will probably be useful.

item.title: My Car
item.caption: The nearest hospital is too far away.

item.title: My Car
item.caption: I found my other bottle of Slowmo pills. I feel like crazy after swallowing them.

item.title: Bookshelf
item.caption: This shelf is filled with my books, there's only one book missing.

item.title: Bookshelf
item.caption: I remember now! The panic room door is behind this bookshelf, I need the missing book to open it!

item.title: Secret passage
item.caption: The panic room door is visible now but I don't remember the secret code, it must be written somewhere!

item.title: Panic room door
item.caption: The code I entered opened the panic room door.

item.title: Statue
item.caption: An statue of her. There's a date carved on the base: 'February 16th.', She beautiful, isn't her...?

item.title: Statue
item.caption: 'February 16th'...0216...That's the number I'm looking for, the secret code for entering the panic room!

item.title: Locked Door
item.caption: The door is locked I need something to open it.

item.title: Locked Door
item.caption: After shooting down the lock, the door wide opens, also showing that I have a pretty good aiming.

item.title: A Book
item.caption: I wonder how many pages I could read before the poison kills me.

item.title: A Book
item.caption: I'm sure this is the book missing in the book shelf. I took it.

item.title: Catnip
item.caption: I see a catnip can and some food leftovers.

item.title: Catnip
item.caption: I took the catnip, now the cat will let me grab it.

item.title: That cat
item.caption: The cat looks very upset, it looks like it won't let me grab it

item.title: That cat
item.caption: I can grab the cat while it's distracted with the catnip.

item.title: That cat
item.caption: I found it, the antidote capsule! It was in a box attached to the cat's necklace. I'M CURED BIATCH!

item.title: Photograph
item.caption: I remember that she used to feed the cat some catnip to calm it down.

item.title: Security Camera
item.caption: This reminded me of the panic room I recently installed. The recordings in there might show me where she hid the antidote.

item.title: Bed
item.caption: I love when Al Pacino says 'en tu cama verde especial'.

item.title: Security Video
item.caption: I can see it in the video! The cat has a small box attached to its collar. There's a capsule inside it.
